SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AESCrypt
AES encryption and decryption - from Baeldung
Annotations
Annotations for SQL domain classes and fields for Domain object persistence mechanism.
Annotations.Accumulation
For fields of type Set<? extends SqlDomainObject>: Defines field as managed 'accumulation' field.
Annotations.Changed
Definitions for version control: Changes
Annotations.Created
Definitions for version control: Creation
Annotations.Crypt
For fields: Defines that value of this string field will be stored encrypted in database.
Annotations.Removed
Definitions for version control: Removal
Annotations.Secret
For (simple) fields and also domain classes: Defines a field (or class) as secret, which means content will never be written to logs (independent of log level).
Annotations.SqlColumn
For fields which are associated to columns (not array, Collection or Map fields): (Non default) column name, NOT NULL and UNIQUE constraint, text length, etc.
Annotations.SqlEntryTable
For array, collection or map fields: name of (non-default) entry table which are associated to complex field
Annotations.SqlTable
For domain classes: (Non default) table name, UNIQUE constraints and INDEXes of SQL table associated with domain class.
Annotations.StoreAsString
For fields: Forces that values of annotated field will be converted to String before they are persisted in database (works only for field types which are not natively supported by Domain object persistence mechanism).
Annotations.UseDataHorizon
For object domain classes: Defines strategy for keeping domain class objects in local object store (heap) by SQL domain controller.

Array helpers

Calendar helpers

File and path helpers
CFile.DirMaskFilter
Filter for searching subdirectories working like file masks in console.
CFile.ExtFilter
File search filter for file extensions.
CFile.MaskFilter
File search filter working like file masks in console.
CList
List helpers
CLog
Logging helpers
CMap
Map helpers
CMath
Numerical helpers
Common
General and string helpers
Common.KeyValueSep
Key/value separator type: EQUAL_SIGN, COLON
Common.StringSep
String separator type: SPACE, LINE_SEPERATOR, SEMICOLON, AND, SLASH, DOT, COMMA
ConfigException
Exceptions thrown on missing or wrong configuration (e.g.: missing database connection string)
ConnectionPool
JDBC database Connection pool.
Const
Constants names of columns and fields
CProp
Enhanced property management supporting properties for different runtime environments.
CRandom
Random helpers
CReflection
Java Reflection helpers.
CResource
Java resource helpers
CSet
Set helpers
DomainController<T>
Manages domain object store.
DomainException
Exceptions thrown on domain class registration errors.
DomainObject
Base class for objects managed by a domain controller.
FieldError
Error description which will be associated to a field of a specific domain object on problems saving or loading field data to/from database
Java2Sql
Java program to generate SQL scripts for persistence database.
ObjectNotFoundException
Exception thrown if an object is not contained in object store ('registered') on try to access this object using DomainController.get(Class, long).
SqlConnection
Thin autoclosable database connection layer based on ConnectionPool.
SqlDb
SQL database connection object based on ConnectionPool provides high level methods to perform SQL SELECT, INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE statements.
SqlDb.DbType
Supported database types: ORACLE, MS_SQL, MYSQL, MARIA
SqlDbException
Exceptions thrown using SqlDB methods.
SqlDbTable
Objects of this class are associated to SQL database tables and contain table and column meta data.
SqlDomainController
Domain controller for SQL based persistence mechanism.
SqlDomainObject
Base class for objects managed by SqlDomainController.
